---
title: "Read Raw Data - CKL"
format: pdf
---

# Load Packages

```{r}
#| label: packages

library(readxl)
library(here)
```

# Load CKL Data

```{r}
#| label: load_CKL_data

raw_CKL <- read_xlsx(here("raw_data", "CKL-Intox_Data_Pull.xlsx"),
                     col_names = TRUE)

save(raw_CKL,
     file = here("data", "raw_data", "raw_CKL.rda"))
```
